process.name: start-gis-discovery-workflow
process.label: Initiate GIS discovery workflow for the object

process.name: generate-geoblacklight
process.label: Generate Solr document for GeoBlacklight schema

process.name: load-geoblacklight
process.label: Load Solr document into GeoBlacklight Solr index

process.name: export-opengeometadata
process.label: Export metadata files for import into OpenGeoMetadata repository

process.name: finish-gis-discovery-workflow
process.label: Finalize GIS discovery workflow for the object
